site_name: 30-33 Sloane Street, 49 Pavilion Road, 2-4 Hans Crescent and the Garages to the rear of Marland House, LONDON, SW1
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission PP/22/06706 (Partial demolition of 30-33 Sloane Street and erection of a 5-storey building of Class E including installation of shopfronts. Demolition of no. 2 Hans Crescent and erection of replacement building to provide Class E floorspace including a rooftop terrace. Reconfiguration and extension of ground floor of no. 49 Pavilion Road to re-provide Class E floorspace. Provision of substation in basement of no. 4 Hans Crescent and provision of facilities. (MAJOR APPLICATION)) for primarily internal alterations, with some small-scale external alterations including: Basement layout adjustments for improved circulation; ground floor retail unit modifications for enhanced accessibility; office lift lobby reconfiguration; introduction of additional WC/shower facilities; revised smoke extract and dry riser locations; and railing added to outside boundary wall.
